meanings.definition: An alternative that is superior or surpasses others.
meanings.sent1: When I couldn't find my favorite snack, I tried a superaltern that ended up being even tastier!
meanings.sent2: The new phone model is a superaltern to the old one, with better features and a sleek design.
meanings.sent3: My friend's idea to have a picnic in the rain was a superaltern to our usual indoor plans.
meanings.sent4: The superhero's superaltern power allowed him to fly faster than a speeding bullet.
meanings.sent5: The superaltern route through the forest was not only quicker but also more scenic than the main path.

meanings.definition: To choose or select an alternative that is better than the original option.
meanings.sent1: I decided to superaltern my usual route to work and found a faster way with less traffic.
meanings.sent2: She always superalterns her outfits to stand out in a crowd with unique style choices.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to superaltern the recipe when he realized he was out of a key ingredient.
meanings.sent4: In the game, players can superaltern their characters' abilities to gain an advantage in battles.
meanings.sent5: To improve his health, he made a conscious effort to superaltern his eating habits by choosing nutritious foods.
